name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Edward WATTS, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Edward WATTS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of November 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as phrased by petitioner, is:
Does subsequent decisional law amount to a new “fact” under 42 Pa.C.S. § 9545(b)(ii) of the PCRA?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
984 A.2d 935
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Edward WATTS, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 24, 2009.
